titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Stanford Student Housing Collection
titlestmt.author: Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Department of Special Collections and University Archives
publicationstmt.p: Copyright © 2015 The Board of Trustees of the Leland Stanford Junior University. All rights reserved.

note.p: This encoded finding aid is compliant with Stanford EAD Best Practice Guidelines, Version 1.0.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.abstract: Collection includes three scrapbooks (clippings, photos, press releases, brochures) 1949-69, with one specifically on married student housing; dedication program for the Rains Houses, 1988, photographs of faculty for whom courts and lounges in Rains were named, and photographs of Liliore Green Rains; two certificates to Lucie Stern, 1941; and a printout of a list of student dormitories on campus and of biographies of faculty for whom dorms are named, 2007.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Stanford Student Housing Collection (SC0895). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Collection includes three scrapbooks (clippings, photos, press releases, brochures) 1949-69, with one specifically on married student housing; dedication program for the Rains Houses, 1988, photographs of faculty for whom courts and lounges in Rains were named, and photographs of Liliore Green Rains; two certificates to Lucie Stern, 1941; and a printout of a list of student dormitories on campus and of biographies of faculty for whom dorms are named, 2007.

did.unittitle: Printout of list of student housing on campus and of biographies of faculty for whom dorms are named
Certificates to Lucie Stern: honorary ASSU membership, 1941, and Honorary Fellow designation granted by University Trustees
Scrapbook (brown) “Life Among the Indians” Clippings re dorms, staff, fraternities, faculty, and other college dorms
Scrapbook (red with SU seal) “Married Student Housing” Clippings, photos, press releases, brochures
Scrapbook kept by Dick Forsberg Clippings re dorms, student unrest, faculty matters, and Russian track team of 1962; also includes letter to Forsberg re death of Judy Cech Dool 1964

Mounted photographs of Margery Bailey, Christina Harris, David Harris, Henry R. Fairclough, Stephen & Vladimir Timoshenko, Paul Kirkpatrick, Ernest R. & Josephine Hilgard, and Bailey Willis [courts and lounges named for these faculty]
